title: Add animated About Us section to home page

requirements.text: Add an animated 'About Us' card section on the home page positioned below the header section and above the 'Our Services' section

quotes: just as a small "About us" section in a animated card in the home page just below the header section and above the " Our Services Section"

acceptanceCriteria: About Us section appears on the home page between the hero/header and the services section
Section uses an animated card component with scroll-reveal animations consistent with existing page patterns
Card styling matches the premium glassmorphism design system already in use (glass effects, gradients, shadows)
Animation triggers on scroll using IntersectionObserver pattern like other sections
Section is compact and concise as specified by 'small' in the request
Content introduces Oishi Heal Touch clinic with brief overview appropriate for homepage placement

constraints: Must maintain existing glassmorphism design system and premium visual styling
Must use scroll-reveal animation patterns already established in HomePage.tsx
Position must be specifically between header and services section
nonGoals: Replacing or modifying the existing full About page at /about
Modifying the header or services sections themselves
Creating a lengthy about section with all company details
